name: Lie to Me
description: Students say three sentences about themselves. Two are true, one is fake. Class interrogates them, then votes.

name: Draw & Guess
description: One student draws a word on the board, while others guess what it is.

name: Hot Seat
description: One student sits with back to the board. You write a word (e.g., “doctor”), others describe it without saying the word directly.

name: Find Someone Who...
description: Find someone who has a cat / plays football / ate noodles today. Student needs to ask questions to find the person.

name: Show me
description: Show a picture of something and ask students to describe it silently, others need to guess what it is.

name: Hangman
description: A word guessing game where players guess letters to reveal a hidden word. Each incorrect guess draws part of a hangman figure.

name: Floor is Lava
description: Students must cross the room without touching the floor. They can use furniture, books, etc.

name: Countries
description: Students name a country in a round, one names a country, the next must name a country starting with the last letter of the previous country. . If they can't, they are out. Last one standing wins.

name: Word Association
description: One student says a word, the next must say a word related to it. Continue until someone can't think of a word.

name: 20 Questions
description: One student thinks of an object, others ask yes/no questions to guess what it is within 20 questions.

name: Dead eye
description: Draw a target on the board. Students take turns throwing a sticky-ball at it. If they hit, they must answer a question about themselves/lesson.

name: Who Am I?
description: Students write a name of a famous person on a sticky note and stick it to their forehead. They ask yes/no questions to guess who they are.

name: Find the hidden object
description: Students leave the class. You hide an object in the classroom. Students return and try to find it.
